articles.title: Jude Bellingham fined by German FA over comments about referee Felix Zwayer
articles.description: Jude Bellingham has been fined €40,000 (£33,970) by the German Football Association (DFB) for his comments about referee Felix Zwayer after Borussia Dortmund’s Bundesliga defeat to Bayern Munich.
